snippet.title: Inform - ZMachine
snippet.description: Inform - ZMachine. Inform generates programs for a virtual computer invented in 1979 called the Z-machine: Interpreters · Tools · CrossCompiling · Standards.

snippet.title: Playing Interactive Fiction: Inform
snippet.description: Rather than running directly on any one computer, they are programs for a virtual machine (eiher the "Z-machine" or "Glulx") designed specially for IF.
